***Empowering Communities with Easy-to-Use Digital Tools to Participate in Marine Renewable Energy Planning & Development***

## Workshops

This Phase 1 project is active Aug 2022 to Apr 2023. We will conduct a series of workshops in California to solicit feedback for building out tool(s) for Phase 2 to follow.
